text: Egha Pol mɨgɨa ghua, kamagh mɨgei, “Kamaghɨn ami, kɨ kamagh sua, ia kamaghɨn fogh, Godɨn akurvazim, a Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba bagha anemadagha gɨfa. Eghtɨ me oragham!”(28:28-29) Fofozir gumazir mabar ghaze, mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir mam uaghan iti. Akar kam kamakɨn, “Pol akar kam mɨkemegha gɨvazɨma, Judaba anetegha ghu. Ezɨ adarir dafar men tongɨn otozɨma me uarira uariv gɨa, akabar uariv sosi.”
